about_the_game:
Unleash the Feline Fury!

If you are like us you have noticed that WARCANA is lacking a crucial component, NINJA CATS! Our latest DLC is here to fix that! This expansion pack is a must-have for anyone who believes strategy games could use more whiskers and whisker-thin victories.

What's Inside This Cat-tastic Supporter Pack?

Introducing the Silent Prowler!
Meet the Silent Prowler, the stealthiest unit to grace the battlefield. While this kitty might not pack a powerful punch, it excels cuteness. It’s not about raw power – it’s about winning with style!

Shinobi's Abode
Give your feline forces a place to call home with the Shinobi's Abode, our newest barracks. This tranquil and hidden retreat will train your Silent Prowlers to perfection.

Two New Campaign Missions
Take on two new challenging campaign missions with a cat-centric twist. Test your strategic thinking and adaptability in these fun and unique scenarios.

Five New Cat-Themed Profile Titles
Show off your love for all things feline with five new profile titles. Whether you’re a "Shinobi Lord" or a "Can Opener", there’s a title here to match your cat-like cunning.

The Hand's New Look
Your advisor, The Hand, has a new look inspired by our feline friends. Now, every piece of advice comes with a touch of cat-like wisdom.

Why Get This Pack?

This DLC is more than just additional content – it’s a way to support the continued development of our game and ensure we can keep bringing you fun and quirky updates. While the new units and features don’t provide any game-breaking advantages, they do offer something even better: the chance to outwit your opponents with feline finesse.

Note: No actual cats were harmed in the making of this DLC. We did, however, consume an extraordinary amount of Anime for inspiration.
